result.execSummary:
The defendant Ryan B. WITTER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Methamphetamine with intent to deliver, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(e)3.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.   
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.   Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 07-22-15 at 11:00 a.m.   Plea date is set for 11-20-15 at 9:00 a.m.   
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.   
Minutes.
Brian Van Ells, through public defender.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 07-08-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.
RE:  Possess Methamphatamine with intent to deliver, on 06-16-15.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of 3 counts child abuse, possess Methamphetamine with intent to deliver and possess drug paraphernalia.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 06-29-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $10,000.00 cash with the conditions that he have no contact with D.V.S., DOB: 06-22-2003, J.J.C., DOB: 11-04-2007, D.S.M., DOB: 04-29-2002 or the residence of 2022 East River Street, Two Rivers, WI and must maintain absolute sobriety.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody. Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
